title: Everything Numerology Book (Everything Series)
features: Use numbers to improve every aspect of your life!
How can the number six help soothe your spirit? Why does a person whose name begins with the letter U have such a warm smile? What do numbers tell you about the person you should marry?

As readers discover in The Everything® Numerology Book, every number is alivea living energy source flowing from and into infinity that carries both positive and negative characteristics. As numerologists know, numbers can help us learn more deeply about our own giftsand recognize those we never knew we had.
This easy-to-use book can help you tap into the power of numbers to:
·Unravel the meanings of numbers in birth dates, addresses, and phone numbers
Find out what the numbers in your life say about your role in the universe!
description: Ellae Elinwood is a teacher of Eastern healing arts and a frequent guest on television and radio shows. She has studied numerology since the 1960s, applying it to both her personal and professional life. She lives in Ashland, OR.
